transcript.title: UNKNOWN
transcript.content:
FOR MEDIA 29 APRIL 1988
Former United States Governor of Pennsylvania, Mr Richard L
Thornburgh will attend the 1988 celebration of
Australia-America Week as the personal representative of
President Reagan. Governor Thornburgh was Assistant US
Attorney-General under President Ford and is currently
Director of the Institute of Politics at the Harvard
University John F Kennedy School of Government. The
celebration of Australia-America Week marks the close and
continuing ties of friendship between our two countries. 006148
